SEARCH
Package entity.enemies

Class MovingBehaviour

java.lang.Object
entity.enemies.MovingBehaviour
Direct Known Subclasses:
ChaseBehaviour, PatrolBehaviour
public abstract class MovingBehaviour extends Object
Represents the movement behavior logic for an enemy in the game.

  • Method Details

    • isPathBlocked

      protected boolean isPathBlocked(Enemy enemy, Level level, float moveSpeed)
      Determines whether the enemy's movement path is blocked by either a wall or the absence of a floor in the level.
      Parameters:
      enemy - the enemy whose path is being checked
      level - the current level the enemy is part of, used to check collisions with tiles
      moveSpeed - the speed at which the enemy is moving, used to calculate the future hitbox
      Returns:
      true if the path is blocked by a wall or if there is no floor ahead, false otherwise

    • setLeftMoveDirection

      protected void setLeftMoveDirection(Enemy enemy)
      Sets the enemy's movement direction to the left.
      Parameters:
      enemy - the enemy whose movement direction is being set

    • setRightMoveDirection

      protected void setRightMoveDirection(Enemy enemy)
      Sets the enemy's movement direction to the right.
      Parameters:
      enemy - the enemy whose movement direction is being set
